headlines.description: A brace from Jamie Vardy gave Leicester City a commanding 4-1 victory over basement side Huddersfield Town at the John Smith's Stadium.

headlines.description: Crystal Palace all but banished any relegation fears as Luka Milivojevic fired home a late penalty to edge Newcastle 1-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milivojevic penalty seals Palace win at Newcastle
